mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_QA(QA_CATEGORY , USER_ID , QA_CONTENT , QA_LOGTIME , QA_PWD , QA_REPLY , QA_SEQ , QA_STATE , QA_SUBJECT) VALUES(#{qa_category},#{user_id},#{qa_content},sysdate,#{qa_pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,qa_seq.nextval,#{qa_state},#{qa_subject})
mapper.select:
SELECT QA_SEQ, QA_CATEGORY, QA_SUBJECT, USER_ID, QA_LOGTIME FROM ( SELECT QA_SEQ, QA_CATEGORY, QA_SUBJECT, USER_ID, QA_LOGTIME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY QA_SEQ DESC) AS RNUM FROM BOARD_QA WHERE 1=1
) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY QA_SEQ DESC

SELECT COUNT(QA_SEQ) FROM BOARD_QA WHERE 1=1
AND QA_SEQ > 0
SELECT qa_seq , QA_PWD , QA_CONTENT , QA_SUBJECT , USER_ID , QA_LOGTIME , QA_STATE FROM BOARD_QA WHERE qa_seq = #{qa_seq}
